page.title: 17Wetwang,Kid's Leisure Time
page.content: In Wetwang we havn't got a park which is a pity but most children play out on{rollerboots}and they go{bike {riding.} We can{play on the school field after school as well as at school so most of the boys play{football}on it. Some people play{tennis}on the school playground and we play all sorts of games.In winter the pond is good for{skating}on and it's good just to go{sliding}on the school playground. Wetwang is a good place for having a{walk}because there's lot of places to go like for example down Green Lane. It's a nice walk down Station Hill. It's good down Northfield Road where the railway line used to be.
